name: thirsty (Karina Popp)
description:
"You know, you know you're thirsty

You thirsty
Oh, you're thirsty
Oh, you're thirsty
Oh, you're thirsty
Oh, you're thirsty"

- Mariah Carey

"We are all hungry and thirsty for concrete images. Abstract art will have been good for one thing: to restore its exact virginity to figurative art."

- Salvador Dali
